content.title: Ghar Ghar Aushodhi Yojana
content.details: Rajasthan government has planned a new scheme called Rajasthan Ghar Ghar Aushadhi Yojana to promote the use of Ayurvedic and medicinal herbs across the state. The state government is planning to implement the scheme to boost the immunity and defense system of the citizens of the state. Under this Rajasthan Ghar Ghar Aushadhi Yojana, medicinal plants like Tulsi, Ashwagandha, Giloy and Kalmegh will be distributed.
benefits: It aims to promote medicinal plants and their use in daily life
It aims to help people to boost their immunity, lead a healthy and disease-free life
Each family will be provided 24 saplings over a period of 5 years
This Rajasthan Ghar Ghar Aushadhi Yojana will help in boosting a strong defence system which will lead to a good health for all and thus overall development in the state.
eligibility: Applicant must be a native of Rajasthan state.
Should have Jan Aadhaar Card of Rajasthan Government.
Should have enough space to plant.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Rajasthan government has planned a new scheme called Rajasthan Ghar Ghar Aushadhi Yojana to promote the use of Ayurvedic and medicinal herbs across the state.

faqs.question: What Are The Benefits Under The Scheme?
faqs.answer: To provide medicinal plants like Tulsi, Ashwagandha, Giloy and Kalmegh to everyone.

faqs.question: Who Can Get The Benefits Of The Scheme?
faqs.answer: 1. Applicant must be a native of Rajasthan state. 2. Should have Jan Aadhaar Card of Rajasthan Government. 3. Should have enough space to plant.

faqs.question: May other state person apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, the Applicant must be a native of Rajasthan state.

faqs.question: Is There Any Age Eligibility?
faqs.answer: No, but the person should be above 18 years.

faqs.question: Is There Any education Eligibility criteria for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no such restriction.

faqs.question: What is the application process?
faqs.answer: 1. Applicants have to contact Nagar Panchayat, Municipal Corporation and Municipality. 2. Plants will be distributed through Nagar Panchayat, Municipal Corporation and Municipality. 3. Applicants have to get a form and fill it out with the required details. 4. Applicants must have the Jan Aadhaar details to get the benefits. 5. Submit the form with the required details and documents to the same department.
